===Etymology===
* For the {{furigana|明日|あした}} and {{furigana|明日|あす}} form:
*: From the stem "''as-''", related to {{ja-r|朝|あさ}}, {{ja-r|朝|あした}}, and {{ja-r|明後日|あさって}}.
* For the {{furigana|明 日|みょう にち}} form:
*: From {{etyl|ltc|ja}} {{IPAchar|/*miaŋȵiɪt̚/}} > {{etyl|ja|-}} {{IPAchar|/mjauniti/}} > {{IPAchar|/mjounit͡ʃi/}}

{{ja-pron|あす|y=i|acc=o|acc_note=''as a noun''|acc_ref=NHK,DJR,SMK5|acc2=h|acc2_note=''as an adverb''|acc2_ref=NHK}}

# [[tomorrow]]

====Usage notes====
Note that the pronunciation differs depending on register, which also happens for the antonym "yesterday" and the coordinate term "today". Corresponding in formality to ashita/asu/myōnichi "tomorrow" are {{ja-r|昨日|きのう}}/{{ja-r|昨日|きそ}} (rare)/{{ja-r|昨日|さくじつ}} "yesterday" and {{ja-r|今日|きょう}}/{{ja-r|今日|こんにち}}/{{ja-r|本日|ほんじつ}} "today".

====Antonyms====
* {{ja-r|昨日|きのう}}, {{ja-r|昨日|さくじつ}}, {{ja-r|昨日|きそ}}

====Coordinate terms====
* {{ja-r|今日|きょう}}, {{ja-r|今日|こんにち}}, {{ja-r|今日|こんじつ}}, {{ja-r|本日|ほんじつ}}

====Related terms====
* {{ja-l|明静}}
